729136f-a.title: Richmond: McClean Avenue - Arthur Avenue
729136f-a.text:
250 MoClean Avenue, south side, between Arthur and Mills
Avenues, showing Rigali's Hotel. The hotel is about 150 feet back
of the Avenue.
August 25, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
729136f-a.folder: McClean Avenue & Arthur Avenue, Staten Island, NY
